parameterdescription.para: If the client is initialized successfully. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Assign handles to the AMS Client instance.

detaileddescription.para: Call this function when a link has been established with a peer to associate the link to this instance of the module. This makes it possible to handle several links and associate each link to a particular instance of this module.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation is successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Subscribe to the Remote Command notification.

briefdescription.para: Unsubscribe from the Remote Command notification.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation is successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation is successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.
